languages.text: "Вы приняли жесткое, но необходимое решение. Но перед этим пошли на поводу у паникующего младшего офицера. Подвергли свою жизнь лишней опасности в зоне возможного бунта. И спровоцировали все, что произошло. Не дай вы лейтенанту Вент лишнюю надежду, а потом не отбери ее вот так — она бы не сломалась! Вам не нужно было вообще спускаться на нижние палубы".

"You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."
languages.original_text: "Вы приняли жесткое, но необходимое решение. Но перед этим пошли на поводу у паникующего младшего офицера. Подвергли свою жизнь лишней опасности в зоне возможного бунта. И спровоцировали все, что произошло. Не дай вы лейтенанту Вент лишнюю надежду, а потом не отбери ее вот так — она бы не сломалась! Вам не нужно было вообще спускаться на нижние палубы".

You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您做出了一个残酷但很有必要的决定。但在此之前，您被那位惊慌失措的下级军官牵着鼻子走。当您身处叛乱一触即发的状况时，您将您的生命置于毫无必要的危险之中，而您的决定又引发了随后发生的一切。您就给了温特中尉虚假的希望，之后又夺走了它。如果您一开始就没有这么做，她根本就不会崩溃！您根本不需要亲自前往底层甲板。”
languages.original_text: "You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: “您做出了一个残酷但很有必要的决定。但在此之前，您被那位惊慌失措的下级军官牵着鼻子走。当您身处叛乱一触即发的状况时，您将您的生命置于毫无必要的危险之中，而您的决定又引发了随后发生的一切。您就给了温特中尉虚假的希望，之后又夺走了它。如果您一开始就没有这么做，她根本就不会崩溃！您根本不需要亲自前往底层甲板。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Ha tomado una decisión dura, pero necesaria. No obstante, antes de hacerlo bailó al son de una oficial joven aterrada. Puso su vida en un riesgo innecesario en medio de una sublevación en potencia, y sus actos fueron los detonantes de todo lo que sucedió después. ¡De no haberle dado falsas esperanzas a la teniente Vent solo para arrebatárselas, no habría estallado! No tenía ningún motivo para visitar las cubiertas inferiores personalmente».
languages.original_text: "You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: «Ha tomado una decisión dura, pero necesaria. No obstante, antes de hacerlo bailó al son de una oficial joven aterrada. Puso su vida en un riesgo innecesario en medio de una sublevación en potencia, y sus actos fueron los detonantes de todo lo que sucedió después. ¡De no haberle dado falsas esperanzas a la teniente Vent solo para arrebatárselas, no habría estallado! No tenía ningún motivo para visitar las cubiertas inferiores personalmente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは厳しくも必要な決断を下しました。ですが、その前に、あなたはパニックに陥った下士官に踊らされたのです。蜂起の可能性がある中で、あなたは自分の命を不必要な危険にさらしました。そして、あなたの行動がその後のすべての引き金となったのです。あなたがヴェント副官に偽りの希望を与えなければ、そしてそれを再び奪い去らなければ、彼女が怒ることもなかったでしょう！下層デッキの近くへと行く必要はなかったのです」
languages.original_text: "You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは厳しくも必要な決断を下しました。ですが、その前に、あなたはパニックに陥った下士官に踊らされたのです。蜂起の可能性がある中で、あなたは自分の命を不必要な危険にさらしました。そして、あなたの行動がその後のすべての引き金となったのです。あなたがヴェント副官に偽りの希望を与えなければ、そしてそれを再び奪い去らなければ、彼女が怒ることもなかったでしょう！下層デッキの近くへと行く必要はなかったのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt eine harte, aber notwendige Entscheidung getroffen. Doch davor habt Ihr nach der Pfeife eines panischen niederen Offiziers getanzt. Ihr habt Euer Leben inmitten eines potenziellen Aufstands unnötig riskiert. Und Euer Handeln hat alles ausgelöst, was darauf folgte. Hättet Ihr Lieutenant Vent keine falsche Hoffnung gemacht und sie ihr dann wieder weggerissen, wäre sie nicht durchgedreht! Ihr hattet nichts in der Nähe der Unterdecks zu suchen."
languages.original_text: "You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt eine harte, aber notwendige Entscheidung getroffen. Doch davor habt Ihr nach der Pfeife eines panischen niederen Offiziers getanzt. Ihr habt Euer Leben inmitten eines potenziellen Aufstands unnötig riskiert. Und Euer Handeln hat alles ausgelöst, was darauf folgte. Hättet Ihr Lieutenant Vent keine falsche Hoffnung gemacht und sie ihr dann wieder weggerissen, wäre sie nicht durchgedreht! Ihr hattet nichts in der Nähe der Unterdecks zu suchen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez pris une décision difficile, et néanmoins nécessaire. Mais avant cela, vous avez prêté foi aux divagations d'un officier subalterne en proie à la panique. Vous avez risqué votre vie inconsidérément alors que l'insurrection menaçait d'éclater, et par vos agissements irréfléchis, vous avez vous-même provoqué tout ce qui s'est ensuivi. Si vous n'aviez pas donné de faux espoirs à la lieutenante Vent avant de revenir sur votre décision, elle n'aurait pas bronché ! Vous n'auriez jamais dû mettre les pieds sur les ponts inférieurs. »
languages.original_text: "You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez pris une décision difficile, et néanmoins nécessaire. Mais avant cela, vous avez prêté foi aux divagations d'un officier subalterne en proie à la panique. Vous avez risqué votre vie inconsidérément alors que l'insurrection menaçait d'éclater, et par vos agissements irréfléchis, vous avez vous-même provoqué tout ce qui s'est ensuivi. Si vous n'aviez pas donné de faux espoirs à la lieutenante Vent avant de revenir sur votre décision, elle n'aurait pas bronché ! Vous n'auriez jamais dû mettre les pieds sur les ponts inférieurs. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Sert ama gerekli bir karar verdiniz. Ama öncesinde, şaşkın bir kıdemsiz subayın laflarına uydunuz. Patlak vermek üzere olan bir isyanın ortasına atılıp hayatınızı tehlikeye attınız. Sonrasında olanların da müsebbibi sizsiniz. Teğmen Vent'e umut verip umutlarını boşa çıkarmasaydınız gözü böyle dönmezdi! Alt güvertede hiçbir işiniz yoktu."
languages.original_text: "You made a harsh but necessary decision. But before that, you danced to the tune of a panicking junior officer. You put your life at unnecessary risk in the midst of a potential uprising. And your actions triggered everything that followed. If you hadn't given Lieutenant Vent false hope and then snatched it away again, she wouldn't have snapped! You had no business going anywhere near the lower decks."

traits.locale_text: "Sert ama gerekli bir karar verdiniz. Ama öncesinde, şaşkın bir kıdemsiz subayın lafına göre hareket ettiniz. Patlak vermek üzere olan bir isyanın ortasında hayatınızı tehlikeye attınız. Sonrasında olanların da müsebbibi sizsiniz. Teğmen Vent'e umut verip umutlarını boşa çıkarmasaydınız gözü böyle dönmezdi! Alt güvertede bir işiniz yoktu sizin."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
